kaninator.graphics
Class VisibleElement

java.lang.Object
  kaninator.graphics.VisibleElement

public class VisibleElement
extends java.lang.Object

An intermediate form of the visible objects Wraps the Drawable objects together with the on screen coordinates so they can be drawn by a Canvas object.

Author:
phedman
See Also:
Drawable, Canvas

Constructor Summary

          Wraps a drawable object with the onscreen coordinates x, y, and the height it is positioned at.

Constructor Detail

VisibleElement

public VisibleElement(Drawable _drawable,
                      int _x,
                      int _y,
                      int _height)
Wraps a drawable object with the onscreen coordinates x, y, and the height it is positioned at.

Parameters:
_drawable - The drawable in question.
_x - The x-coordinate for the element.
_y - The y-coordinate for the element.
_height - The height the element is positioned at.
